mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (name, pwd, role, avatar, ctime) values (#{name}, #{pwd}, #{role}, #{avatar}, #{ctime})
mapper.delete: delete from sys_user where id = #{id} and admin = 0
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.name, a.avatar, a.status, a.role, a.admin, a.ctime,b.name role_name from sys_user a left join sys_role b on a.role=b.id where a.admin=0
order by a.ctime desc
mapper.update: update sys_user set pwd=#{pwd} where id=#{id} and admin=0
